review: It's incredibly practical and capable enough to take orders from YouTube iPhone app and the Amazon Fire Remote app. My only real complaint is how sometimes it freezes up and the overheating. I really wouldn't have minded something with a larger body just to make sure it could protect itself from excess heat

review: I love how easy it was to install on my daughter's tv. All of her preprogrammed children's shows have their own playlist and it plays until we cut it off. Her tv time is limited so it's great that there's so much to choose from.
